headline.main: Italy on the Firing Line of the Winter War

lead_paragraph: The re-emergence of Italy into the news is a sure sign that the winds of war are blowing south. During the long Summer months, while the Germans were throwing their massed man power and air force into the endless morass of Russia, a strange quiet brooded over the Italian peninsula.
abstract: A O McCormick on Ital situation

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
